casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Percy Allen WILLIAMS, Jr. No. 554P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Daniel S. Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of November 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review": "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008." HUDSON, J., recused.
